thread.section_title: Care nurse charged for forcibly lap-dancing on 100-year-old man – Metro
thread.title: Care nurse charged for forcibly lap-dancing on 100-year-old man
thread.title_full: Care nurse charged for forcibly lap-dancing on 100-year-old man

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Care nurse charged for forcibly lap-dancing on 100-year-old man
text:
The second caretaker wasn’t charged.
The director of the assisted living center said Fultz, of Marblehead, was fired and the other caretaker also no longer works at the facility.
The most recent annual state inspection report of the center shows no citations, according to Ohio Department of Aging records.
